entries.title: HexedBits
entries.description: Independent and freelance app development. Contracting and consulting for iOS with various clients.

entries.title: Software Engineer (iOS), PlanGrid
entries.description: Note: PlanGrid was acquired by [Autodesk](https://www.autodesk.com) in [November 2018](https://adsknews.autodesk.com/pressrelease/autodesk-to-acquire-plangrid).
bullets: Shipped a number of features: polygon annotation tools, multiple assignees and followers for Tasks, user groups, Tasks "rewrite" to include planned work and issues ("sheetless tasks"), advanced filtering and sorting for Tasks. All features included local database migrations and syncing with backend, as the app must be completely functional offline. We used SQLite directly and maintained our own SQLite DSL in Swift.

Contributed to a number of mobile infrastructure improvements, including building out internal frameworks, adding pull request automation with [Danger](https://danger.systems), and improving code quality with [SwiftLint](https://www.github.com/realm/SwiftLint).
Helped release and maintain open source framework, [ReactiveLists](https://www.github.com/plangrid/ReactiveLists).

Acted as Release Captain to manage biweekly releases, which includes triaging bug/crash reports, managing branches and fixes, and submitting final build to AppStore Connect. We used [Fastlane](https://fastlane.tools) to automate much of the process.
Helped refine interview process for new candidates, including developing questions and quizzes.
Mentored new hires and junior teammates.

entries.title: Software Engineer (iOS), Instagram
bullets: Shipped updates to the App Store on a weekly schedule.

Launched the immersive video viewer and IG Events on Search and Explore ([Wired](https://www.wired.com/2015/10/instagrams-new-video-channel-shows-you-whats-happening-now/), [Recode](https://www.vox.com/2015/10/31/11620230/instagram-joins-snapchat-twitter-with-new-event-specific-content), [Mashable](https://mashable.com/2015/10/31/instagram-video-feature-halloween/#ghiqRNNjG5qI)).

Worked on mobile infra team to refactor the main feed and co-author the open source framework, [IGListKit](https://github.com/Instagram/IGListKit) ([Blog post](https://instagram-engineering.com/open-sourcing-iglistkit-3d66f1e4e9aa)).
Launched and maintained the new [IG Direct](http://blog.instagram.com/post/159452790942/170411-newdirect) ([TechCrunch](https://techcrunch.com/2017/04/11/instachat-direct/)).
Rewrote entire Direct messaging infrastructure on the iOS client using IGListKit, including moving to protocol-oriented, immutable models.
Deployed new features and experiments via Facebookâ€™s A/B testing frameworks.
Acted as Release Captain to manage biweekly releases, which includes triaging bug/crash reports, managing branches and cherry-picks, and submitting final build to AppStore Connect.
Mentored new hires and junior teammates via 1:1 talks, as well as code reviews.

entries.title: Software Engineer (iOS), Rosetta Stone
bullets: Released and maintained the [Advanced Languages](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id879261486) app. Previously named "Advanced English For Business".
Used CoreText and speech recognition engine to build a read-along learning activity.
Built vocabulary cards, matching, and other learning activity frameworks.
Authored over a dozen internal frameworks (private CocoaPods) in efforts to build up mobile infrastructure.
Worked effectively with remote teammates.
Authored and published the company's first ever [open-source projects](https://github.com/rosettastone/).

entries.title: Contractor (iOS), Hemoglobe
entries.description: A collaboration with designer [Michael Schultz](https://michaelschultz.com) and funded by Affinity Biotech. Hemoglobe was an iOS app for staying in touch and meeting new people with bleeding disorders. It was shutdown in early 2016 and is no longer available.
bullets: Built the entire app and collaborated with Michael on implementing his designs.
Used [Parse](https://parseplatform.org) BaaS for backend.
Features included a feed of nearby users, private 1:1 messaging, and user profiles.

entries.title: HexedBits
entries.description: Independent and freelance app development. See [hexedbits.com](https://www.hexedbits.com).
